original_text: As for all the other events of Ahaziah’s reign, and what he did, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel?
korean_text: 아하시야가 행한 그 남은 사적은 모두 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for all the other events of Ahaziah's reign
sentences.korean_translation: 아하시야 왕의 다른 모든 행적에 관해서는

sentences.original_text: in the book of the annals
